reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress chic and well-made, with a comfortable fit that's particularly suitable for short people.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So comfortable and stylist -buying more colors
items.body: Just tried it on for an engagement party tomorrow. Measured and ordered accordingly and the dress fits perfect. The burgundy color is so rich. Love the flow of the dress and style. The sleeves are stylish too. Ordered a black one too. After seeing how nice the fabric is and the style, I am going to order the coffee to go with brown boots. The burgundy will be worn with black boots. Super pleased with this purchase. 63 years old, 5’4, 185 lbs, wear L and XL normally, size 16. I ordered XL for this. It has pockets too! Read more
items.author: Terry King

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A 1
items.body: I love this dress, perfect quality, length and fit. The pockets are a bonus. The dress has a decent stretch to it and it does not wrinkle which makes it perfect for travel. There are great colors to choose from as well. I give this a 10. Read more
items.author: jill stabeno

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fall dress
items.body: Super cute, comfortable and fits great Read more
items.author: wegd

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for any event.
items.body: Wore this to a sorority meeting. I loved the quality, the fit, and how comfortable it was. I received multiple compliments. Read more
items.author: DEE

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Extremely oversized.. retuned
items.body: Extremely oversized so if that’s the style you want it’s for you. The material is not cotton so it’s much lighter better for a warm fall day then if it were actually chilly out. I loved the idea and pockets but it was a giant balloon on me. I wanted it loose but not a size or 2 too big. Sadly returned! Read more
items.author: Life things

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty
items.body: Very pretty and well made but runs large. Had to return and could not reorder since small was the smallest size offered. Read more
items.author: Shannon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely!
items.body: Lovely!!!!! I’m bigger in the middle and it is hard finding a flattering dress. This one is great. Material is thick and flowing. The detail on the sleeves is very nice. Just need a good steamer to get the wrinkles out. I added some gold jewelry and heels and it looked great for church. The hot pink color is very rich. True to size. I got a size medium. I am 5’ 4” and 160 lbs and it is above my knee and plenty of room in the mid section. Read more
items.author: Ginger Hubbard

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: This dress is so cute. Very nice material and looks great with a wide belt. I got many compliments on it. Highly recommend this dress Read more
items.author: Jax

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A-light Blue, A-yellow, Z2-green, A-black, A-light Green, A-burgundy, A-navy Blue, Z2-black, A-beige, Z2-sky Blue, A-rose Red, S-coffee, A-coffee, A-orange. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
